text:
Aur Saanp, kaisa hai?
Vaise toh jo memoir tujhe chahiye tha woh aa hi gaya hai, lekin agar time mile toh isse bhi padh lena!
Bhai kabhi kabhi sochta hu ki agar IC ke nominations nahi bhare hote toh life kitni different hoti‚Ä¶ Apni baatein 3rd year me shuru hui and I‚Äôm glad uske baad kabhi ruki hi nahi..
Kaafi maze kiye tumhare sath 3rd and 4th year me.. Almost pure din apan saath hi rehte the.. Classes sath me bunk kiye, SPO ka kaam sath me kiye and exams ke liye padhai bhi sath me kiye! Raat raat bhar gaane sunna (not to forget, aaloo chatpata WITH EXTRA CHILLY order karna) and ghumna hamesha yaad rahega. Aaj bhi jab ‚ÄúTera Woh Pyaar‚Äù sunta hu toh teri hi yaad aati hai.. Loop me sunte the apan woh song SPO ki terrace pe.. Woh bhi bohot sahi time tha jab apan hall 13 me rahe the during Placements..
Kaafi bakchodi kari apan ne.. Cycling pe jaana; Kotesh and Bhavesh ke maze lenaüòÇ ‚Ä¶ tumhare sath FRIENDS bhi dekha hai kaafi baar..
Mera graduate hone me tera bohot bada haath hai.. Pura 4th year tere hi bharose raha huüòÇ And placement ke liye bhi kaafi guide kiya hai tune! Inn sab ke liye bohot bohot shukriya!
Vaise toh kaafi parties kari hai apan ne, lekin almost har party me sad songs hi chalte the; bohot kam baar nacha hai apan ne.. Next party me kaafi nachenge.. Bombay me kaafi maze kiye apan ne.. Har raat bahar nikalne me kaafi maza aata tha‚Ä¶ Btw tumhari Goa trip due hai!
Tu toh janta hi hai ki meri placements me as such koi preference nahi thi ki mujhe iss role me jaana hai ya fir uss company me jana hai. Lekin yeh cheez hamesha se chahta tha ki apan dono ki job at least same city me ho (now I feel that same country would also have been fine!). Socha tha ki Old Monk se Johnnie Walker tak sath me jaenge! Ummeed toh yahi hai ki 1-1.5 saal baad sath hi rahenge‚Ä¶.
